# app.py

from flask import Flask, render_template, request
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy

app = Flask(__name__)
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = 'sqlite:///taches.db'
db = SQLAlchemy(app)

class Tache(db.Model):
    id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True)
    nom = db.Column(db.String(100), nullable=False)
    description = db.Column(db.Text, nullable=False)
    etat = db.Column(db.String(100), nullable=False)

@app.route('/')
def index():
    taches = Tache.query.all()
    return render_template('dashboard.html', taches=taches)

@app.route('/create', methods=['POST'])
def create():
    nom = request.form['nom']
    description = request.form['description']
    tache = Tache(nom=nom, description=description, etat='en cours')
    db.session.add(tache)
    db.session.commit()
    return 'Tâche créée avec succès'

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run(debug=True)
